snippet.title: TimeMelters - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Version 1.0 is now available on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1096140/Timemelters/

Prevent Doomsday AFTER it happened! Designed by the co-creator of Sang-Froid - Tales of Werewolves and featuring both a single-player and co-op campaign, TimeMelters is a strategy hero defense where you go back in time and fight alongside your past self against an onslaught of powerful foes. 

#indiegame #ign #gaming #indiedev #timetravel
